Uses of Interface
com.fluidops.iwb.cms.File

Packages that use File
com.fluidops.iwb.cms functionality for managing object / file content 
com.fluidops.iwb.cms.extract implementations for extracting metadata and deriving new information out of the contents 
com.fluidops.iwb.cms.fs implementations for providing upload and extraction access to different backends. 
com.fluidops.iwb.cms.util base functionality for the otherpackages

Uses of File in com.fluidops.iwb.cms.fs
 

Classes in com.fluidops.iwb.cms.fs that implement File

          files in a zip archive
 class LocalFile
          contains java.io.File
 class WebDirectory

          wrap HTTP GET
